actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide medicare coverage in all possible cases involving hospital or skilled nursing home care for U.S. citizens outside the United States.

summary.text: Provides, under title XVIII of the Social Security Act, medicare coverage in all possible cases involving hospital or skilled nursing home care for United States citizens outside the United States

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide medicare coverage in all possible cases involving hospital or skilled nursing home care for U.S. citizens outside the United States.
